content:
In the Sumy region there are problems with electricity after a massive rocket attack of the Russian Federation on Friday in the morning.

About thisreportedSumy Ova.

As a result of rocket strokes on the objects of the power system of Ukraine, schedules of emergency shutdowns were temporarily introduced in the settlements of Sumy, Konotop and Shostka districts of Sumy region.

It is noted that for local residents there are points of indomitable, where you can charge your phone, other gadgets, use the Internet.

Energy are working to restore power supply.

As reported by the ArmyInform, the enemy on Friday morning caused12 rocket strokesIn Zaporizhzhia.
title: In Sumy region, the Russians hit rockets on power facilities
description: This was reported by Sumy Ova. As a result of rocket strokes on the facilities of the power system ...
author: Army Inform
